solution_line_template: At a speed of {running_speed} feet per second, for {running_time} seconds, the monkey will travel {running_time} * {running_speed} = <<{running_time}*{running_speed}={distance_running}>>{distance_running} feet.

At a speed of {swinging_speed} feet per second for {swinging_time} seconds, the monkey will travel {swinging_time} * {swinging_speed} = <<{swinging_time}*{swinging_speed}={distance_swinging}>>{distance_swinging} feet.
In total, the monkey will travel {distance_running}+{distance_swinging}=<<{distance_running}+{distance_swinging}={total_distance}>>{total_distance} feet.
